channel.title: Making Senses on My Obsidian Site
channel.description: Recent content in Making Senses on My Obsidian Site

item.description:
we want our life to mean something we need a reason.

For a long time, the reason was survival. Now we are here surviving, doing much more than just surviving and we still need a reason. we can’t bare being helpless for it doesn’t make sense to just be here and not have hope

hope waits around each corner, hope has many streams of awareness inside like a dice, hope has many sides, something is bound to land like a dice, the hope is cut by corners and edges that slice it into a shape with sides we loose the whole picture the meaning is fragmented cut by the need for numbers,

science likes to recognize alot of the characteristics about the physical reality, turns out the more we notice about how the physical reality work, the more we can know how to make it work for us, in this quest for more and more knowledge, we forgot to look and seek deeper into the question of why?

not why plants go through photosynthesis, and all the deeper and deeper ways that this creates and expresses whats going on around us, but why does any of this happen,
